clinical_history: Follow-up ultrasound for known liver lesion.
technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Urinary bladder is smooth-walled, no intraluminal lesions.
Breast tissue shows coarse lesion measuring 10.4 mm.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Gallbladder shows mildly thickened, no stones or wall thickening.
Placenta is ill-defined and normally located.
Prostate is homogeneous; volume approximately 33.65 cc.
